description:
Determined to defeat Katze, Rui and the Hundred face Katze together. Katze merely howls with laughter and takes on a monstrous form. Rui realizes that he had severely underestimated Katze`s true power. When Hajime and the others arrive, Katze vanishes after making cryptic remarks, which leads Hajime to devise an unconventional strategy...
Source: crunchyroll
